nodes.text: The Minister of Finance oversaw the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Finance Ministry, and sat as a member of the Alliance Cabinet. The Minister of Finance was directly responsible for the creation and management of the Alliance's budget, taxes, flotation of Alliance War Bonds, printing of Alliance Credits and balancing of all incomes and expenditures.
Until his death in 3 ABY, Viscount Tardi served as Minister of Finance.
